articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: France shooting: Clashes and tear gas in Marseille as chaos continues - BBC
articles.description: There has been widespread unrest in France for a fifth night over the police killing of a teenage boy.
articles.content:
Media caption, Watch: Blasts heard as police throw tear gas in Marseille
Police and rioters have clashed in the French city of Marseille as the country battles with a fifth night of unrest after the… [+3749 chars]
